The Qur’anic researcher said that this is only the saying of humanity, such as the confirmation of the first sentence, because the intended one of them has denied its void (P-125) Qur’an and the words of God, and the words of God And to administer the union in the intended, it was not overwhelmed by it and divorced themselves on the affirmation of it, without it, and the matter is easy, and in the description of its merits, it is not possible This is the irritating saying, mocking it and indicating that it is about the righteous truth with isolated, then that the one who appears from the followers of the Walid is the one who said: Status, not ignorant of the situation and its words.
